title.narrative: Soutien à la programmation de Croissance pour tous 2014-2015

description.narrative:
IDRC's Supporting Inclusive Growth (SIG) program will use this Research Support Project to fund its programming for years four and five of the initiative. This project will fund short-term activities of less than one year, and will focus on program-level priorities, including developing the external evaluation. Activities funded under this project will aim to enhance the quality and coherence of the program's project portfolio. Regional Funds will also be used toward activities designed to inform and give visibility to the SIG.s objectives.
Research for inclusive growth Project activities will include: -disseminating key project and program outputs -producing communication materials -translating materials into English, French, and Spanish -planning and organizing public events -funding research partners' participation in relevant national and international meetings
SIG will hire an external technical advisor to conduct a review across all program themes.
SIG's program leader will manage the project. The planned activities will evolve over the year, so this project is designed to ensure that SIG can respond quickly to priorities as they emerge.
